summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeKenra Color Maintenance Thermal Spray 11 is a medium hold thermal spray that maintains color vibrancy up to 25 heat styles. This breakthrough formula locks in 98% of color pigments to protect your color while styling.
details: DetailsBenefitsProvides thermal protection up to 450 degreesMedium hold for styling versatilityIncreases shineItem 2533487How To UseHold can 8-10'' from hair. As a styler: Use before hot tools for thermal protection and to lock in color.As a finisher: Spray from mid-lengths to ends for desired hold and finishing results.Precautions: Flammable. Contents under pressure. Avoid spraying in eyes. Do not place in hot water or near radiators, stoves or other sources of heat. Do not puncture or incinerate container or store at temperatures over 120 degrees. Do not use in presence of open flame or spark. Avoid fire, flame and smoking during use and until hair is thoroughly dry. Use only as directed. Intentional misuse by deliberately concentrating and inhaling contents can be harmful or fatal. Keep out of reach of children. First aid treatment: spray in a well-ventilated area. If adverse reaction occurs on skin or scalp, discontinue use and consult a physician. In case of accidental contact with eyes-rinse for 15 minutes. Consult a physician if problem persists.IngredientsAlcohol Denat, Hydrofluorocarbon 152a, Octylacrylamide/Acrylates/Butylaminoethyl Methacrylate Copolymer, Vinyl Caprolactam/Vp/Dimethylaminoethyl Methacrylate Copolymer, Water/Aqua/Eau, Aminomethyl Propanol, Phenyl Trimethicone, Fragrance (Parfum), Hydrogenated Farnesene, Triethyl Citrate, Hydroxycitronellal, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Linalool, Limonene, Hexyl Cinnamal, Citronellol, Geraniol.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsShipping Restrictions : This item cannot be shipped via air.
how_to_use: Hold can 8-10'' from hair. As a styler: Use before hot tools for thermal protection and to lock in color.As a finisher: Spray from mid-lengths to ends for desired hold and finishing results.Precautions: Flammable. Contents under pressure. Avoid spraying in eyes. Do not place in hot water or near radiators, stoves or other sources of heat. Do not puncture or incinerate container or store at temperatures over 120 degrees. Do not use in presence of open flame or spark. Avoid fire, flame and smoking during use and until hair is thoroughly dry. Use only as directed. Intentional misuse by deliberately concentrating and inhaling contents can be harmful or fatal. Keep out of reach of children. First aid treatment: spray in a well-ventilated area. If adverse reaction occurs on skin or scalp, discontinue use and consult a physician. In case of accidental contact with eyes-rinse for 15 minutes. Consult a physician if problem persists.

reviews.headline: Disappointed
reviews.comments: I love kenra products. But this protect is not up to their standards. It make my hair nearly tacky and knoty. And then it doesnt even hold the style. Not to mention when you brush your hair it feels brittle. Will not repurchase.

reviews.headline: Made hair dry and unmanageable
reviews.comments: Used once and will be tossing.  Made my hair dry and completely unmanageable.

reviews.headline: Medium hold & smells great!
reviews.comments: This is the best thermal spray I've found so far, plus it smells amazing! I have long, fine hair and this is perfect for beachy waves and loose curls. I follow with a strong hold hairspray to set it and the curls last all day.

reviews.headline: Not for Me
reviews.comments: Only spritzed on very lightly and it made my hair feel crunchy plus the fragrance was very strong, too perfumy. Returned.

reviews.headline: Great thermal spray
reviews.comments: I use this spray right after I blow dry my hair and before I put my 5 hot rollers in and use the curling iron (on my bangs). It really helps my very straight hair hold the curl. I follow with Kenra 26 hair spray, and it works great.

reviews.headline: Great Product, Bad Sprayer
reviews.comments: I do like this product for flat ironing, and curling.  However, I'm trying one more time.  Twice the sprayer failed to work when there was around 1/4 left of the product.  Maybe a tiny bit less.  They wouldn't return it because so much had been used.  But I paid for a full bottle.  I didn't get to use a full bottle.  I soaked it and tried to clean it many times.

reviews.headline: Good heat protectant
reviews.comments: This is a good heat protectant but when I use it I make sure to wash my hair that night because it makes my hair very dry and stiff.

reviews.headline: Fix the Nozzles!
reviews.comments: I love this thermal spray for protecting and giving my curls some body and retention. However, the last 6 cans have had the nozxle to quit working half way through the can. Im looking for another option, sadly.

reviews.headline: Makes your hair very sticky
reviews.comments: Smells good, and maybe protects good?? But it makes youchair soooo stick and greasy! Its so hesvy it makes your hair flat and filmy feeling.

reviews.headline: Scent is way too sweet
reviews.comments: This thermal spray has a medium hold, doesn't leave a film, but also doesn't really hold well. Worse for me is the sickeningly sweet smell. If you like really sweet, smelling hair, this might be a good product for you.

reviews.headline: Incredible
reviews.comments: I had girls 20 years younger than me commenting on how healthy my hair looked. It is magic.

reviews.headline: Greatest hairspray ever!!! Protects color too!
reviews.comments: I have very soft, ultra straight fine hair. Most hairsprays either don't hold or are so sticky and stiff I feel like I'm tearing out my hair when I brush it at the end if the day. NOT with this. It is the best spray ever. Haven't been able to find more anywhere. I hope Kenra hasn't discontinued. Tried to use #13. It doesn't hold at all. PLEASE MAKE MORE #11!!

reviews.headline: Best Thermal Protection
reviews.comments: I highly recommend this product.  I've tried others previously; however, this by far has protected my hair and helps with keeping it straight.  I have naturally curly hair that is hard to manage and this is a game changer.  Add the Paul Mitchell smoothing serum with it as well.

reviews.headline: Blow out dream
reviews.comments: I use this before a blow dry my hair and it give a great amount of shine and hold. I have very curly hair that's always trying to go back curly with the humidity. With this stuff I don't even need to go over my hair with a straightener and it lasts against the PNW humidity!

reviews.headline: Yes definitely
reviews.comments: Everything

reviews.headline: Perfect hairspray!
reviews.comments: I'm a stylist and use this alot while working with brides and bridal parties. Prep each section before curling. Love that it's not sticky at all , also a heat protectant and smells amazing.  Perfect amount of shine. Lasts all night, what more could you ask for !

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again and again
reviews.comments: I use this after blow-drying and before straightening as a heat protectant and it makes my hair so straight, shiny and it stays straight for days!

reviews.headline: Worked even in high humid weather
reviews.comments: Long-tall can is awkward to handle. Slight smell disappears.  Hair turned out shiny after hot iron. The "curl" held up in a Philadelphia fog.  That's great for my baby fine blonde hair that can't hold a curl & usually ends up doing what it wants,  til now.  Used before the hot iron and a light spray after my hairl cooled down.

reviews.headline: Kenra Hair Spray
reviews.comments: I bought Kenra Color Maintenance and haven't been as please with it as other Kenra products. No volume

reviews.headline: I have very good luck with hair spray
reviews.comments: It works well for my hair!

properties.name: Cons

values.label: Not good If you are looking for a Stiff hold.

display_values: Not good If you are looking for a Stiff hold.

properties.name: Pros

values.label: Strong hold, yet still flexible and not stiff
Love the way it holds my hair in place.
Absolutely love it. Awesome for colored hair.

display_values: Absolutely love it. Awesome for colored hair.
Love the way it holds my hair in place.
Strong hold, yet still flexible and not stiff

media.headline: Perfect hairspray!
media.caption: Used a 1 3/4 curling wand and this hairspray for the look.

faceoff_positive.comments: This is my new found hairspray for beach waves! It contains a heat protectant, holds the shape all night long without making my hair stiff! I spray it in the strand before I use my wand, and then sprayed again after. I will never use another hairspray for this type of style.
faceoff_positive.headline: My new favorite hairspray!

faceoff_negative.comments: i bought this because it was a bit cheaper than paul mitchell hot off the press and i was short on money. it holds okay, but i feel like my curls last longer when i use paul mitchell. my mom was a cosmetologist and we used a lot of kenra products when i was growing up, and it seems like their overall quality used to be a lot better 10 years ago
faceoff_negative.headline: it's okay
